surso profe Net. [imath] \frac{\left[\left(x^{n-1}\right)^{n}\right]^{2}}{x^{n-2} \cdot x^{3}} \cdot \frac{\left[\left(x^{-n}\right)^{4}\right]^{n-2} \cdot\left[\left(x^{n}\right)^{5}\right]^{n-1}}{\left[\left(x^{3}\right)^{n+1}\right]^{n-1}} [/imath]
